title: Welcome
heading: We are happy to serve you
desc:
TemboPlus is a financial service that allows you to make payments to China safely. 

This service is provided by a company licensed by the Central Bank and you can make your business payments directly to Bank Accounts in China, Wechat or Alipay.
registerAndroid: Required Steps: Log in with your Google Account & Verify Your NIN Number
registerIOS: Required Steps: Log in with your Google or iCloud Account & Verify Your NIN Number
start: Anza kwa kuthibitisha namba yako ya simu
